name: XenoShyft: NorTec Elite
storyline: The Hive has proven to be more powerful than we originally expected, but as we’ve fought, brave and fearsome heroes have emerged from the ranks of NorTec’s common soldiers, bringing with them a ferocity to match any Hive monstrosity. Furthermore, our scientists have developed cutting-edge weapons and technologies to bolster NorTec forces.
summary: With this XenoShyft expansion, troops that survive a round in your lane will have the chance to be upgraded to heroes! And you'll randomly find experimental versions of items in your item stacks!
